question: Can someone inform me who knows the difference between punch, shave and excisional biopsy.  Also, if one has long standing brittle type 1 diabetes, and also takes aspirin daily, can you inform which biopsy is more than likely to cause an infection of the three?Which type of dermatologist performs each one of the three biopsies - a general dermatologist or a surgical dermatologist?  Thanking you in advance for your upcoming response!If no one has this information, can you inform please?  Thanks.
title: biopsy
